title: PHP/CodeCoverage/Filter.php not found; using composer on Windows
body:
My Issue:

I've installed Xampp  on my PC (windows); resides in C:\xampp
Adjusted php.ini for composer (openssl.dll)
I've installed composer and made a composer.json file (both in D:\composer).
{
  "require": {
    "phpunit/phpunit" : "3.7.*@stable"
  }
}

extracted xdebug, adjusted php.ini (stating the extension).

I've installed PHPunit  via 'composer install'. PHPUnit is now present in D:\composer\vendor...).

I would like to check if the installation was OK and wrote a small class and a simple test PHP file.
Started a command on windows; gave me a shell to issue command.
typed:  phpunit test/CalculatorTest.php

PHPUnit complains that it can not find PHP/CCodeCoverage/Filter.php. 
The complaint came from from C:\xampp\php\phpunit.
The latter file contains ==> 
               require_once 'PHP/CodeCoverage/Filter.php';

I've checked C:\xampp\php\PEAR*: no such file PHP/CodeCoverage/Filter.php (so the complains seeems to be OK). 

The file Filter.php is however present in
      D:\composer\vendor\phpunit\php-code-coverage\PHP\CodeCoverage
So composer extracted PHPUnit and affiliates. 

I would like some help to install PHPUnit on my system. Could it be outside C:\xampp, but what went wrong. Should I install it inside C:\xampp (but what about the 'vendor' issue.).

Did I forgot something. Is this a Windows Issue (Windows, composer and PHPUnit)... 

== == == ==
When I invoke vendor/bin/phpunit.bat there is no complaint. 
However, the command in xampp is not correct configurated. 

I made a change in C:\xampp\php\phpunit.bat

REM outcommented code at bottom of file
REM if "%PHPBIN%" == "" set PHPBIN=C:\xampp\php.\php.exe
REM if not exist "%PHPBIN%" if "%PHP_PEAR_PHP_BIN%" neq "" goto USE_PEAR_PATH
REM GOTO RUN
REM :USE_PEAR_PATH
REM set PHPBIN=%PHP_PEAR_PHP_BIN%
REM :RUN
REM "%PHPBIN%" "C:\xampp\php\phpunit" %*

REM added link. another drive, another path
D:\composer\vendor\bin\phpunit.bat %*

---

I can now start phpunit from a command (kind of shell in windows), but when I want to use phpunit in phpstorm, the latter assumes that it can be found in C:\xampp\php\PEAR

I've made some attempt to tell phpStorm that phpunit is somewhere else, but no luck so far.
Message:                                  Cannot find PHPUnit in include path (.;C:\xampp\php\PEAR)

In the PHP configuration 'include path' I have '.', 'D:\composer\vendor\phpunit\phpunit\PHPUnit' and C:\xampp\php\PEAR

---

installed PHPUnit with PEAR; no noticable problem with phpunit and phpstorm.
